column4: I completely bonked my installation, is there a way I could do a really refreshing reinstall without actually pulling up install cd's?
"pullling up install cd's?"  what the heck does that mean?!?

easiest way is to keep a couple copies lying around and just reinstall to root directory when necessary, since your /home directory should be on a separate (and safe, i.e.- far away from the root directory) directory
clean installs are the only real way, in my books
